Package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.rgb

package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.rgb
Color space code specialized for RGB. This is the same RGB color space you're almost certainly familiar with, though this has a twist where a channel value of 0.5 is neutral, instead of 1.0. This allows multiplicative blending to lighten as well as darken, while keeping a neutral value at 50% gray.
  • Palette by value
  • Palette by hue
  • Palette by name
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.github.tommyettinger.colorful
    Various utility classes for handling any of the color spaces, which are in subpackages of this one.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColorfulBatch
    A substitute for SpriteBatch that adds another attribute to store an extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the RGB channels of a color by multiplication (called the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from Palette or generated with ColorTools).
    ColorfulSprite
    Holds the geometry, color, and texture information for drawing 2D sprites using ColorfulBatch.
    ColorTools
    Contains code for manipulating colors as int, packed float, and Color values in the RGB color space.
    GradientTools
    Static methods for handling gradients of smoothly-changing colors, typically inside of FloatArrays.
    Palette
    A palette of predefined colors as packed RGB(A) floats, the kind ColorTools works with.
    SimplePalette
    A palette of predefined colors as packed RGB floats, the kind ColorTools works with, plus a way to describe colors by combinations and adjustments.
    TextureArrayColorfulBatch
    Draws batched quads using indices.
